data.name: Additional Annie Costume: Pop Star Outfit
data.detailed_description:
A new costume for Annie is added.
A pop star outfit for Annie. Enjoy battles and daily life sections in new fashion.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Annie.
Change into the costume "Pop Star Outfit" by selecting "Character Editor" when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Annie in the Daily Life section.
Change into the costume "Pop Star Outfit" by selecting "Change outfit" when you are near Annie.

fullgame.name: Attack on Titan 2 - A.O.T.2 - 進撃の巨人２

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 VRAM 1GB or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo 48kHzWAVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3770 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 VRAM 2GB or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch surround 48KHzWAVE
